title: Azure Cascade Diamond Haaram
materials: features meticulously set GH color graded diamonds (total weight 157.59 carats) and two striking cushion-cut Blue Fancy diamonds (total weight 42.82 carats).
features: This stunning three-layered Haaram features a cascade design with graduating diamond pendants. The cushion-cut Blue Fancy diamonds are centrally placed on the lower tiers, framed by a halo of smaller diamonds. The open setting allows for maximum brilliance. Includes 338 smaller diamonds at MQ (-7), 468 smaller diamonds at MQ (+7), 27 small diamonds at PAN(-7) and 127 smaller diamonds at PAN(+7).
colors: Predominantly a sparkling white from the diamonds
complemented by the rich blue hue of the Fancy diamonds. The gold provides a subtle warm undertone.
occasions: Ideal for grand celebrations like weddings (vivaaham)
and high-profile social events. A statement piece that commands attention.
description: A truly exceptional piece, this Haaram blends modern design with classic elegance. The exceptional quality of the diamonds, combined with the rare Blue Fancy stones, makes this a valuable heirloom piece. Its multi-layered design and cascading pendants create a mesmerizing effect.
